recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, Parmesan cheese, pancetta, black pepper
recipes.preparation: Boil spaghetti until al dente. Cook pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs with cheese and pepper. Combine hot pasta with pancetta, then stir in egg mixture off heat. Add pasta water to adjust creaminess and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender grilled chicken in a creamy spiced tomato sauce.
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, yogurt, tomato puree, cream, garam masala, garlic, ginger
recipes.preparation: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices. Grill or bake until cooked. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in butter, add spices and tomato puree. Simmer, then stir in cream. Add chicken and cook until sauce thickens.

recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
recipes.description: Rich and creamy North Indian curry made with paneer cubes simmered in a buttery tomato gravy
recipes.preparation: Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic in butter. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. Blend with soaked cashews into a smooth paste. Return to pan, add spices and simmer. Stir in cream and paneer cubes, cook until paneer is tender. Garnish with coriander and serve hot with naan or rice.
recipes.ingredients: Paneer, butter, tomatoes, cream, cashews, ginger, garlic, garam masala

recipes.name: Vegetarian Lasagna
recipes.description: Layered pasta with roasted vegetables and creamy cheese.
recipes.ingredients: Lasagna noodles, ricotta, spinach, mushrooms, marinara sauce, mozzarella
recipes.preparation: Sauté vegetables and mix ricotta with spinach. Layer sauce, noodles, ricotta mix, and veggies in a baking dish. Top with mozzarella and bake until bubbly and golden. Let rest before serving.
